name: GitVersion
help: GitVersion is a tool to help you achieve Semantic Versioning on your project.

properties.name: TargetPath
properties.help: The directory containing .git. If not defined current directory is used. (Must be first argument).

properties.name: Version
properties.help: Displays the version of GitVersion.

properties.name: Diagnostics
properties.help: Runs GitVersion with additional diagnostic information (requires git.exe to be installed).

properties.name: Output
properties.help: Determines the output to the console. Can be either json or buildserver, will default to json.

properties.name: ShowVariable
properties.help: Used in conjuntion with <c>/output</c> json, will output just a particular variable. E.g., <c>/output json /showvariable SemVer</c> - will output <c>1.2.3+beta.4</c>.

properties.name: LogFile
properties.help: Path to logfile.

properties.name: ShowConfig
properties.help: Outputs the effective GitVersion config (defaults + custom from GitVersion.yml) in yaml format.

properties.name: ConfigurationOverride
properties.help: Overrides GitVersion config values inline (semicolon-separated key value pairs e.g. <c>/overrideconfig tag-prefix=Foo</c>). Currently supported config overrides: <c>tag-prefix</c>.

properties.name: NoCache
properties.help: Bypasses the cache, result will not be written to the cache.

properties.name: UpdateAssemblyInfo
properties.help: Will recursively search for all 'AssemblyInfo.cs' files in the git repo and update them.

properties.name: UpdateAssemblyInfoFileNames
properties.help: Specify name of AssemblyInfo files to update.

properties.name: EnsureAssemblyInfo
properties.help: If the assembly info file specified with <c>/updateassemblyinfo</c> or <c>/updateassemblyinfofilename</c> is not found, it will be created with these attributes: AssemblyFileVersion, AssemblyVersion and AssemblyInformationalVersion.

properties.name: Url
properties.help: Url to remote git repository.

properties.name: Branch
properties.help: Name of the branch to use on the remote repository, must be used in combination with <c>/url</c>.

properties.name: Username
properties.help: Username in case authentication is required.

properties.name: Password
properties.help: Password in case authentication is required.

properties.name: Commit
properties.help: The commit id to check. If not specified, the latest available commit on the specified branch will be used.

properties.name: DynamicRepositoryLocation
properties.help: By default dynamic repositories will be cloned to %tmp%. Use this switch to override.

properties.name: NoFetch
properties.help: Disables <c>git fetch</c> during version calculation. Might cause GitVersion to not calculate your version as expected.

properties.name: Executable
properties.help: Executes target executable making GitVersion variables available as environmental variables.

properties.name: ExecutableArguments
properties.help: Arguments for the executable specified by <c>/exec</c>.

properties.name: MSBuildProject
properties.help: Build an MSBuild file, GitVersion variables will be passed as MSBuild properties.

properties.name: MSBuildProjectArguments
properties.help: Additional arguments to pass to MSBuild.

properties.name: Verbosity
properties.help: Set Verbosity level (<c>debug</c>, <c>info</c>, <c>warn</c>, <c>error</c>, <c>none</c>). Default is <c>info</c>.
